emuInput.TitMainTitle: Elder W. J. Jerry with congregation, in front of New Covenant United Holy Church, Chauncey Street, Hill District
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 3, 1951, pg. 18, reads: "New Pastor - Elder W. J. Jerry comes to pastor the New Covenant United Holy Church, Chauncey Street, with seventeen years of experience. He is pictured (front center) surrounded by officers and members of his new parish. - Harris Photo."
